mapper.select: select * from bigcategory order by bcatenum asc
select * from smallcategory where bcatenum=#{bcatenum} order by scatenum asc
select scataname from smallcategory where scatenum =#{scatenum}
select bcataname from bigcategory where bcatenum =#{bcatenum}
select * from books where scatenum=#{scatenum} order by bnum asc

select NVL(count(*),0) from( select * from ( select aa.* from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.scatenum =#{scatenum} and b.btitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 100) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 110) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 120) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 160) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 160) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 190) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 260) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 270) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 280) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 330) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from( select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select b.*,i.imgsavefilename from books b,img i where b.bnum = i.bnum(+) and i.thumbnail=1 and btype=1 and b.scatenum in (select scatenum from smallcategory where bcatenum = 550) order by b.bnum asc )aa ) )
select * from books where bnum=#{bnum}
mapper.update: update books set bhit=bhit+1 where bnum=#{bnum}
mapper.select: select * from img where bnum=#{bnum}
select b.*,i.* from books b,img i where b.bnum =#{bnum} and b.bnum = i.bnum(+)
insert into bookreview values(SEQ_BOOKREVIEW_REVIEWNUM.nextval, #{mnum},#{bnum},#{reviewcontent},#{bscore},sysdate)
insert into cart values(SEQ_CART_CARTNUM.nextval,#{mnum},#{bcount},1,#{bnum})
select NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM CART WHERE BNUM=#{bnum} and MNUM=#{mnum} and BTYPE=#{btype}
